/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
